Disarmed in St. Louis
 




Chris Carpenter's ailing right wing leaves the Cards shorthanded.  (AP)



      At least the Cards will be champs until October. They don't have much 
      else going for them with Chris Carpenter on the shelf and a rotation 
      that leaves a lot to be desired, Eric Mack says. Power
